column4: hello, im getting low FPS in Q3 and when I try and play movies it is all pink rainbow sort of thing ,
does anyone have any ideas what could cause this/how to fix it?
you have installed the accelerated video card drivers for whatever card you have?
it could be the 'locate' database is updating - its set on a cron job to run once a day.  IF everything was fine.. then suddendly slowwed down.. could check the 'top' command and see whats running
